content.title: Scheme For Study In Abroad
content.details: The Rajasthan State government has started a scheme for girls students. Under this scheme, the state provides an opportunity to the girl students, who get the first three positions in the Rajasthan Board of Secondary Education, to get graduate-level education in abroad for four years.
benefits: A maximum of Rs. 30,000 for coaching and up to Rs.50,000 for registration for SAT (Scholastic Aptitude Test) examination will be borne by the state government per student on the basis of actual expenditure.
An amount of Rs. 25 thousand will be given to each girl student for submitting an application form for admission to a foreign university.

After the acceptance of the application by the foreign university, full accommodation facility of the university will be given and the economy class fare will also be provided to meet the parent once a year.
A maximum amount of up to Rs.10.00 lakh per year will be spent on all the items on each student in the 4-year course.
eligibility: The applicant girl should be among the first three girls at the state level studying in class 10th government school of Board of Secondary Education, Rajasthan.
The girl students securing the first three positions are given the opportunity to pursue graduate-level education abroad.

faqs.question: What is the scope of this scheme?
faqs.answer: In the year 2010-11, Rajasthan Government has taken the initiative to encourage girl child education by starting a scheme to Study Abroad.

faqs.question: What are the benefits under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Financial Assistance is provided by the state government.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicant girl should be among the first three girls at the state level studying in class 10th government school of Board of Secondary Education, Rajasthan.

faqs.question: Can only the people of the Rajasthan state apply for this scheme?
May other state student apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only Rajasthan State Students may apply for the scheme benefits.

faqs.question: What is the Qualification eligibility?
faqs.answer: The applicant girl should be among the first three girls at the state level studying in class 10th government school of Board of Secondary Education, Rajasthan.

faqs.question: How To Apply For The Scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicants have to visit the web portal, download the application form, fill out the form in the prescribed manner, and submit the application to District Education Officer.

faqs.question: What Documents Are Needed?
faqs.answer: Aadhar Number, Age proof, Address Proof, Bonafide/ Domicile certificate, 10th and 12th mark sheet, Passport.

faqs.question: How to download the application form?
How many student will get the chance to get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: The Top three girls of class 10th from the Board of Secondary Education, Rajasthan.
